response.overview: Somewhere between Slacker, Clerks, and Swingers came NoHo, the absurdist indie comedy about unemployment, enlargement, and enlightenment. This is the story of Quinn Whiteman and Harvey Davenport, two down and out roommates barely existing in the L.A. suburban hellscape of mid-1990's North Hollywood. Quinn is looking for love, as well as another menial job to replace the one he just lost, while Harvey deals with two big concerns; expiring unemployment insurance and an unexplainable penile problem.
response.title: NoHo
